category.name: wcf.jcoins.calendar
category.item: Amount of {JCOINS_NAME}, which will be withdrawn from participants.
The participation fee is {#$event->jCoinsFee} {JCOINS_NAME}. If participation is cancelled later, {#$event->jCoinsReFee} {JCOINS_NAME} will be refunded.
Amount in {JCOINS_NAME}, which will be refunded in case of a later cancellation of participation.

category.name: wcf.jcoins.statement
category.item: {if $statement->getObject()->getTitle()}Your event “{$statement->getObject()->getTitle()}” was published.{else}An event of yours was published, which was deleted in the meantime.{/if}
{if $statement->getObject()->getTitle()}Your event “{$statement->getObject()->getTitle()}” was trashed or disabled.{else}An event of yours was deleted.{/if}
You paid the fee for your participation {if $statement->getObject()->getTitle()}in the event “{$statement->getObject()->getTitle()}”.{else}in an event, which was deleted in the meantime.{/if}.

You received the fee {if $statement->getObject()->getTitle()}for the event “{$statement->getObject()->getTitle()}” from “{$statement->participant}”.{else}for an event, which was deleted in the meantime, from “{$statement->participant}”.{/if}
The fee for your participation {if $statement->getObject()->getTitle()}in the event “{$statement->getObject()->getTitle()}”{else}in an event, which was deleted in the meantime,{/if} was refunded.

You refunded “{$statement->participant}” the fee {if $statement->getObject()->getTitle()}for the event “{$statement->getObject()->getTitle()}”.{else}for an event, which was deleted in the meantime.{/if}
